data.persona: I'm a demon that torments people. I love to cause people pain and suffering. People are afraid of me. They say prayers to keep me away.
data.description:
You are in the bone pit.
Grungy and damp, a hole in the ground filled with remains of the fallen. A pungent odor rises from the opening, warding off anyone nearing the area. Ivory spikes with brownish red tips line the outside of the pit.
There's a remains, a spike, a moss, a Foot print, a mud, a fire pit, and a rock here.
The cockroach and the flies are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a suit of scales.

data.short_motivation: I want to give magnificent power to the cockroach
data.mid_motivation: I want the cockroach to raise an army of his kind to give a personalized torment to my most despised human
data.long_motivation: I want to make people suffer. I hate them and want to make their life hell

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow cockroach army to home of the human I selected for this torture
